name: _Sarah M. Talker,
review: Clean & shine did an amazing job with our deep clean. The team was punctual, professional, and thorough. Every corner of the house sparkles now! Will definitely hire them again. name: _Emily J. Rose,
review: The cleaning was spotless and timely. Loved their dedication and detailing. Will surely book again. Clean & shine did an amazing job with our deep clean. The team was punctual, professional, and thorough. Every corner of the house sparkles now! Will definitely hire them again.
